Text.Page:
Fishing is the best sport there is! Would you like to try for yourself? We could always use another angler!

You're new to fishing? Don't worry! That's why we're here. After we teach you the basics, we'll teleport you to a fishing spot.
Hey there, fellow angler! You ever tried to catch a BAF? Don't forget that our duty is to spread the word about how wonderful fishing is. Would you like to go to another fishing spot?
